statements: DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE achievements LIKE '%gold%' AND score > 100;
DELETE FROM game_logs WHERE log_id = 500 AND action_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM game_inventory WHERE user_id = 10 AND item_name = 'Sword';
DELETE FROM game_scores WHERE score > 100 AND level < 5;
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'admin' AND score < 50;
DELETE FROM user_inventory WHERE item_id = 456 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 123 AND username = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM user_friends WHERE friend_id = 456 AND user_id = 789;
